entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
